title: Spy x Family Basics
description: Test your knowledge of the Forger family and their secret lives!

questions.question: What is Loid Forger's codename as a spy?
questions.explanation: Loid Forger is known as 'Twilight', Westalis's greatest spy!

questions.question: Anya can read minds.
questions.explanation: Anya is a telepath who can read the thoughts of people around her - though she keeps this secret from her family!

questions.question: What is Yor Forger's secret profession?
questions.explanation: Yor is secretly an assassin known as 'Thorn Princess' who works for an underground organization!

questions.question: What school does Anya attend?
questions.explanation: Anya attends the prestigious Eden Academy, which is crucial for Operation Strix!

questions.question: Bond is a dog who can see the future.
questions.explanation: Bond is a precognitive dog who was experimented on and can see glimpses of the future!

questions.question: What is the name of Loid's mission to prevent war?
questions.explanation: Operation Strix requires Twilight to get close to Donovan Desmond by having his child befriend Desmond's son!

questions.question: What are the star rewards called at Eden Academy?
questions.explanation: Stella Stars are rewards for exceptional behavior or academics. Anya needs 8 to become an Imperial Scholar!

questions.question: Yor's younger brother Yuri works for the secret police.
questions.explanation: Yuri Briar works for the State Security Service (SSS) and is dedicated to catching spies - ironic since his brother-in-law is one!
